body.name: Jocovieh Large Soft Deep-Green Rugs for Bedroom, 6x9 Feet Fluffy Carpets, Indoor Modern Plush Area Rugs for Living Room Kids Girls Room, Non-Slip Shag Rug for Nursery Home Decor, Deep-Green
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 40 mins
features: 【Super Soft Area Rug】- Our soft rug is composed of shaggy velvet and thick memory sponge. The cloud-like touch relaxes your tired feet and warms your cold feet. The simple look is in line with modern home decoration style and will brings you a good mood.

【Prime Velvet Material】 - Our ultra soft and fluffy area rugs are made of luxury velvet. You can let your kids or pets play on it trustingly, and they will certainly love the softness of this shag rug. This is a perfect choice of your home decor.

【Upgraded Anti-Skid Carpet】- There are thousands of high-strength anti-skid latex particle on the back of the carpet, which greatly enhances the friction between the carpet and the floor. Superb edging technology makes the carpet not easy to roll or fall off.

【No Shedding or Fading】 - Our premium furry rug has no shedding or fading problems. You can lie on it reassuringly. But because the rug itself has some fluff, please pat off the fluff before using. And try not to lie on it in black clothes

【Easy to Clean】- Our carpets can be easily cleaned with a damp cloth or a low-power vacuum cleaner. If you want to wash it thoroughly, hand washing can prolong the service life compared with machine washing. After washing, place it in a dry and ventilated place for air drying.
body.description: About Our Area Rugs:Premium Materials- Soft & Durable1. The surface of our fluffy rug is made of lots of premium velvet fibers. The fluff is delicate, soft and dense, giving you a cloud-like touch experience.2. The middle padding of the shag rug is made of high elastic memory sponge.3. The bottom of the plush rug is made up of densely improved non-skid latex particles to improve security.Modern Indoor Rugs- Multiple SizesOur fluffy rugs are in line with the minimalism of modern interior home decor: 3 x 5 feet rug is suggested for bedside, nursery, or kids room.4 x 6 feet and 5 x 7 feet rug are suggested for bedroom or playroom.6 X 9 feet rug is suggested for living room.Easy Care Carpet- Easy to Clean & StoreThe plush carpet is machine washable, but we recommend hand washing to extend its service life.For daily cleaning: Shake out the obvious crumbs first. Then use a damp cloth or a low-powered vacuum cleaner for a simple clean.For deep cleaning: Add proper amount of mild detergent, soak and wash with your hands. Then put the carpet in a cool, ventilated place to air dry.In addition, the carpet can be easily rolled up by hand and placed in the corner.Rapid Resilience- No Fear of VacuumThe vacuum compression packing of the carpet to keep it clean makes it appear thin at first. But due to its good resilience, the carpet will gradually return to its fluffy shape after lying flat on the ground for 2-3 days.（The rug may give off some smell when opening the package, which is a normal phenomenon caused by warehouse storage. Please leave it in a ventilated place for 1-2 days, and the odor will dissipate.）Any other questions, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I Absolutely love my area rug! It's the perfect blend for my color scheme in my livingroom. It's very soft and comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This looked so small at first but when you lay it out it was perfect. It is extremely soft and so nice! Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for price
reviews.reviewText: It’s super soft and size is good for the price !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Was expecting more..
reviews.reviewText: We were expecting it to be a little more bigger and fuller but, it was niece and complimented our front room. Cleaning is another story but what do you expect when its fluffy. Well priced i will say if your looking for a simple good rug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I’m not thrilled
reviews.reviewText: I had high hopes for this rug but this rug is not a 6x9 it’s way smaller than I expected. Its fuzzy as advertised but not thick. It’s thin really thin. I wanted this to fit under my queen size bed and by the size of a 6x9 it should absolutely fit with extra. Yea it doesn’t do that. I like the rug for what it is of course. But not super happy with it. I will need to order another one to fill in the space it doesn’t cover. Just be aware it’s super thin. My son has one in his bedroom a big black fluffy one and it’s way better quality then this one but it was a gift and I dont know the brand. Otherwise I would have ordered that one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Quality is SO low
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased many of these rugs for my home for different rooms. I have been happy for the price with the quality of these rugs. Always. This one, however, is disgustingly cheap and low quality quality. It will not fluff out, it slides everywhere, and it’s thinner than a dollar store bath mat. This is no joke. I couldn’t tell you the last time I left a product review. But this was so bad I couldn’t NOT. So here I am. Buyer beware. Will be returning. Dont waste your time or money. Though the color is spot on for the picture, (I ordered the dark green) everything else is terrible. Nothing else good to say.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great rug! I have one in pink for our daughter and green for our son. Very soft and easy to clean!
